segments.text: Good morning , Madam . How can I be of service ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to pay this cash into my account please . I usually do it at the machine , but the queue is very long today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I'm sorry about that . One of our Atms is down and we are waiting for it to be repaired , but it should be up and running again very soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Here's my Bank Book .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You need to fill out the deposit slip as well . Here you go , Madam .
segments.speaker: S1
